title: Create KV store seeds and register
description:
## Objective

Create the KV store seed data for both FO-11 agents (discovery + affirmation) and register them in the seed index.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md — Section: "KV Store Keys"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- src/db/seeds/fo-11.ts

**Files to modify:**
- src/db/seeds/index.ts — Add fo-11 import and spread

## Implementation

1. Create src/db/seeds/fo-11.ts with all seed entries. Reference src/db/seeds/fo-10.ts for the exact pattern.
2. Discovery agent seeds (version namespace fo-11-discovery):
   - _info.default, _model_name.default (gpt-4o), _temperature.default (0.8)
   - system.default — System prompt with intent framework, question adaptation, skip logic, chip format rules
   - prompt_step_5.default — Intent: understand life context. Chip format: fragments ending with "...". Skip rule: if goal answer already has rich context, set skip=true. Output format: JSON with skip, question, initialChips (8), expandedChips (15)
   - prompt_step_6.default — Intent: learn preferred support tone. Chip format: single words only. Never skip. Output format: JSON with skip=false, question, initialChips (8), expandedChips (12)
3. Affirmation agent seeds (version namespace fo-11-affirmation):
   - _info.default, _model_name.default (gpt-4o), _temperature.default (0.9)
   - system.default — Copy from fo-10-affirmation system prompt
   - prompt.default — Initial generation prompt (same as fo-10 but without familiarity reference)
   - prompt_with_feedback.default — With liked/discarded context
4. Add import and spread to src/db/seeds/index.ts

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — seed file compiles
2. SeedRun — npm run db:seed completes without errors

Run: npx tsc --noEmit && npm run db:seed

Do NOT close until tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed completes without errors
